title-part.text: FINISHING WORK ON BUILDINGS, e.g. STAIRS, FLOORS

note.note-paragraph:
The following IPC groups are not used in the CPC scheme. Subject matter covered by these groups is classified in the following CPC groups: E04F11/09 covered by E04F11/02
E04F11/17 covered by E04F11/16

CPC-specific-text.text: e.g. Florentine blinds or jalousies; Outside screens

whereby the pivot axis of the articulation is parallel to the roller
whereby the pivot axis of the articulation is perpendicular to the roller

whereby the arm is of the lazy tong type
